review: Couldn't use the remote.  The only way it would work was standing directly in front of the TV, then if you pushed a button it would skip about 4 spaces.  Very hard to control.  Couldn't go back or forward normally.  Called, got a replacement remote yesterday.  I can't get it to work, but hopefully my son will be able to get it to work over the weekend.  I really do hope it does work, it looks awesome.. I am afraid the remote needs some work though.  Even getting it open to put the batteries in is a challenge.
author: Cathy Vignali

review: After just a few days, Fire stick is all it was cracked up to be.  Check back in a couple of months for an updated review.

review: Works great.  To get CATV I have to pay for a cable box; which I didn't want to do, not to mention the space a box takes up.  FireStick gives me movies, TV series and other viewing options.  Would definitely recommend this to others.

review: The Fire Stick was inexpensive and easy to set up.  I was able to set up ESPN and watch sports free of charge.  The receiver goes behind the TV and pickups up a strong signal from the remote.Watch out...though.  If you click on the "30 day trial for Amazon Prime Membership", they will charge your account for a membership with no email message or anything.  If a Prime member has added you as a sub-member, you are unable to watch Prime content.
author: Joan Mims
